Reason: The 'row_cache_save_period' configuration is classified as performance-sensitive. This is because the configuration directly impacts the system performance by scheduling the saving of the row cache at a specified interval. The 'initRowCache' method initializes the row cache and uses the 'row_cache_save_period' configuration to determine when to save the cache. The saving of the row cache can significantly affect the system's performance, as it involves time-expensive operations related to I/O usage. Therefore, the configuration is considered performance-sensitive due to its direct and substantial impact on system performance.
